name: Vidya Bharati Foundation

address: Mohankrupa Society, Nr. Vejalpur Railway Track, Satellite

briefDescription: Vidya Bharati Foundation is a Registered Non Profit / Non Government / Non Political / Non Communal and professionally managed Organisation following its mission of making a difference in lives of underprivileged children in and around Gujarat. For undertaking the integrated education and health care programme for the children. It is our aim to ensure basic quality education to the disadvantaged children and women. We are working in Govt. Primary Schools of Ahmedabad, Sanad and Bharuch area and our community based education centres in weaker section colony of Ahmedabad.
